page.title: 13TRANSPORT BUS SERVICES
page.content: In Upshire from Mondays to Fridays the buses start running at 06:48 and stop at 21:34 with 11 buses.On Saturdays the buses start at 07:48 and finish at 21:34 with 13 buses approximately 1 per hour.Many people in Upshire want more buses and they also want a direct bus service to Waltham Cross as this is where most of them do their shopping.Some want a tube station in Upshire.About 50% of the residents in our area are happy with the service and 50% are not.They said that they want lower fares and more frequent buses.Some wanted more routes from the area and a Sunday service.It was also said that they wanted a service from Upshire to St.Margarets Hospital.
